tr_timeInServiceDesc: Muda utongezwa kwenye masaa jumla ya huduma
tr_sharedMinistry: Imeshiriki katika aina yoyote ya huduma mwezi huu
tr_addRecordDesc: Bado huna rekodi za ripoti ya huduma ya kila siku. Ziweke hapa kujaza ripoti yako ya kila mwezi.
tr_extraTimeDesc: Je, ungependa kuhamisha masaa haya hadi mwezi ujao?
tr_averageMonthlyBibleStudies: Wastani wa mafunzo ya Biblia kila mwezi
tr_maximumMonthlyBibleStudies: Wastani wa juu wa mafunzo ya Biblia kila mwezi
tr_maxPublisherShift: Idadi ya juu ya wahubiri kila pindi: {{ maxPublisherCount }}
tr_partnerNeededDesc: Wahubiri wengine wataona hii na waweze kupanga nawe
tr_maxPublisherLabel: Idadi ya juu ya wahubiri kila pindi
tr_havePartnerDesc: Chagua mwandamani wako kutoka kwenye orodha au weka jina lake
tr_addToCalendarDesc: Je, ungependa kuongeza tukio hili kwenye kalenda yako binafsi? Unapaswa kuwa na programu ya kalenda imewekwa kwenye kifaa chako.
tr_deletePWLocation: Futa eneo la utumishi wa umma
tr_deletePWLocationDesc: Kufuta eneo hili huondoa kabisa data na mipangilio yake yote. Kitendo hiki hakiwezi kutenduliwa.
tr_cantDeductStudiesDesc: Huwezi kuchagua masomo kidogo kuliko uliyochagua tayari kwenye menyu ya 'Mafunzo ya Biblia'.
tr_includesServiceAndCredit: Includes field service and credit hours
tr_noDailyRecordsDesc: No daily service records yet. Add the record to include it in your monthly report.
tr_reportPageInfo: On this page, you can view reports from publishers and add reports from those who do not use Organized. Select a publisher to start.
tr_alreadySubmittedWarning: This month’s report has already been submitted to the Branch Office. Only late reports can be added, unless you undo the submission.
tr_submitReportDesc: Submit the report for this month to your elders?
tr_noDailyRecordsMonthClosed: No daily service records for this month.
tr_undoSubmissionDesc: Are you sure to undo the submission of this report? Please note that this will also remove the report already sent to the secretary.
tr_undoSubmissionDone: Please make any necessary adjustments to this report and submit it again as soon as possible
tr_specialMonthsDesc: List of months where auxiliary pioneers can report 15 hours
tr_bibleStudiesNotice: Report one study per student each month
tr_hoursCreditPresetAddedInfo: The chosen credit hours preset will appear in the monthly report's comment field. Edit it there if needed.
tr_S10ReportNotGenerated: This year’s report hasn’t been generated yet. Generate it to see all the details and then submit.
tr_quickAssignAPDesc: This publisher is assigned as an auxiliary pioneer this month. You can change this on the publisher's enrollments list on the Persons page.
tr_S21CardTitleDesc: Select ‘All publishers’ to export and sort all records for publishers, full-time, and auxiliary servants, or ‘Specific publishers’ to export records only for selected publishers.
tr_S21ExportMultipleDesc: Select the publishers you want to include in the exported records. Each publisher will be included in a separate file.
tr_unverifiedReportDesc: Open the Field service reports page to check and verify reports from the publishers.
tr_reminderPublisherReport: Tuma ripoti yako ya kila mwezi
tr_reminderPublisherReportDesc: Inapaswa kutumwa kwa mwandishi kabla ya siku ya 6 ya mwezi.
tr_reminderBranchReport: Ripoti ya Utumishi wa Shambani na Hudhurio la Mkutano (S-1) bado haijatumwa
tr_reminderBranchReportDesc: It should be submitted to the branch office no later than the 20th day of the month.
tr_firstReportDesc: Mwezi ambapo ripoti ya utumishi wa shambani ya mtu huyo ilikusanywa kwa mara ya kwanza kwenye "Organized"
tr_undoBranchReportSubmissionDesc: Je, una uhakika wa kutengua uwasilishaji wa ripoti hii? Fanya marekebisho yoyote muhimu na uwasilishe ripoti iliyosasishwa haraka iwezekanavyo.
tr_reportExcluded: Mwezi huu unatangulia tarehe ya ripoti ya kwanza ya mhubiri, kwa hivyo haiwezi kuhaririwa
tr_reportReadOnly: Ripoti hii ya mchapishaji haiwezi kuhaririwa tena kwa kuwa ripoti ya ofisi ya tawi ilikuwa tayari imewasilishwa
tr_bibleStudiesMonthlyLess: Huwezi kuweka mafunzo ya Biblia chini ya jumla uliyo nayo kutoka kwa rekodi zako za kila siku
tr_hoursDecreaseErrorDesc: Huwezi kuweka saa chini ya jumla uliyo nayo kutoka kwa rekodi zako za kila siku
